summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding a Daubert motion to preclude testimony from experts Dietz and Loftus. The sender indicates the motion is being prepared for team review, with the Dietz section completed.

events.title: Daubert motion preparation
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates a draft Daubert motion to a team for comments, with sections targeting expert witnesses Dietz and Loftus.

keyFacts: A Daubert motion was being prepared in November 2021 to preclude the testimony of expert witnesses Dietz and Loftus.
The motion was being drafted by an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The section of the motion targeting expert Dietz was already completed and praised.
The email indicates active litigation involving expert testimony was ongoing at that time.
